summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3978 for the improvement of Calhoun Street, from 24th Avenue North to 19th Avenue North, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48386, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
